mapper.select: SELECT subsubject.abolitionSubject , abosub.name abolitionSubjectName, substi.name substitutionSubjectName, subsubject.departmentId, d.departmentName FROM substitution_subject_list subsubject LEFT JOIN subject abosub ON subsubject.abolitionSubject = abosub.id LEFT JOIN subject substi ON subsubject.substitutionSubject = substi.id LEFT JOIN department d ON subsubject.departmentId = d.id ORDER BY subsubject.departmentId

SELECT subsubject.abolitionSubject, abosub.name abolitionSubjectName, substi.name substitutionSubjectName, subsubject.departmentId, d.departmentName FROM substitution_subject_list subsubject LEFT JOIN subject abosub ON subsubject.abolitionSubject = abosub.id LEFT JOIN subject substi ON subsubject.substitutionSubject = substi.id LEFT JOIN department d ON subsubject.departmentId = d.id WHERE (#{subject} IS NULL OR #{subject}="" OR #{subject}=abosub.name OR abosub.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%') OR #{subject}=substi.name OR substi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%')) ORDER BY subsubject.departmentId

SELECT subsubject.abolitionSubject, abosub.name abolitionSubjectName, substi.name substitutionSubjectName, subsubject.departmentId, d.departmentName FROM substitution_subject_list subsubject LEFT JOIN subject abosub ON subsubject.abolitionSubject = abosub.id LEFT JOIN subject substi ON subsubject.substitutionSubject = substi.id LEFT JOIN department d ON subsubject.departmentId = d.id WHERE subsubject.abolitionSubject = #{subjectId}
mapper.update: UPDATE substitution_subject_list SET substitutionSubject = #{substitutionSubject} WHERE abolitionSubject = #{abolitionSubject}
